entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
